description: MIDWEEK MASTERPIECE A tasty and fresh burrito hits the spot on any day. Thanks to the Old El Paso Burrito Kit, you have what you need to make your own in a flash! Taco Tuesday can't come around soon enough.
keywords: Chicken Burritos With Charred Corn Salsa
name: Chicken Burritos With Charred Corn Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt 485g Old El Paso Burrito the Kit

recipeInstructions.text: Divide lettuce, chicken, corn salsa, avocado and a little burrito salsa from the kit among tortillas. Roll to enclose filling. Serve with remaining burrito salsa and lime wedges.
